titleStmt.title: Military and maritine [sic] discipline in three books.
titleStmt.author: Venn, Thomas. Military observations.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Tyler and R. Holt for Rob. Pawlet, Tho. Passinger, and Benj. Harlock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

Military observations, or, Tacticks put into practice for the exercise of horse and foot / by Thomas Venn--An exact method of military architecture, the art of fortifying towns / rendred into English by John Lacey ; out of the works of Andrew Tacquet--The complete gunner / translated out of Casimir ...[et al.]--Doctrine of projects applied to gunnery / by Galilaeus and Torricellio-Observations out of Mersennus and other authors.
